original: Andersson, Bror Oscar Ludvig, länsveterinär, Visby, f. 7/5/02 i St. Herrestad, Malmöh. 1., av godsförvalt. Otto A. o. Maria Ludvigsen. G. 41 m. Birgit Kjellström. Barn: Birger f. 42, Hans-Oiof 43, Per-Erik 45. — Stud:-ex. i Ystad 21, veter:ex. 33. M. stats-bidr. delt. i internat. veter :kongr. i Zürich 38 o. nord. veter :mötet i Köpenhamn 39, stud:res. t. Danm. 58 o. 39. Tjg. s. tf. distr :veter. i olika distr. 31-35, tf. statens tuberkuloskonsul. h. medic:styr. 35, ord. dito sed. 35, byrådir. i medic:styr. 38-41, läns-veter. i Gotl. 1. sed. 41. V. ordf. i Sv:es yngre veter. fören. 34, led. av styr. f. Sv. veter :fören. f. bekämp. av nötkreaturstuberkulos sed. 38, ordf. i Sv. länsveter :fören. sed. 45, ordf. i Gotl. veter :fören. sed. 41, led. av 46 års köttbesiktn :komm., sekr. i Gotl. djurskyddsfören. sed. 42. Skr.: Aktuella problem beträff. nötkreaturstuberkulosens bekämp. (Lantbr :veckans handl. 40), Bekämp. av tuberkulos h. nötkreatur (Hush :sällsk. Tidskr. 40). Hobbies: motorer, ridning.
translated: Andersson, Bror Oscar Ludvig, county veterinarian, Visby, born May 7, 1902 in St. Herrestad, Malmöhus. Son of estate manager Otto A. and Maria Ludvigsen. Married in 1941 to Birgit Kjellström. Children: Birger born 1942, Hans-Olof born 1943, Per-Erik born 1945. He graduated from Ystad in 1921 and obtained his veterinary degree in 1933. Participated in international veterinary congress in Zurich in 1938 and in the Nordic veterinary meeting in Copenhagen in 1939. Travelled to Denmark for medical studies in 1938 and 1939. Served as temporary district veterinarian in different districts from 1931 to 1935 and as temporary state tuberculosis consultant from 1935 to 1938 before being appointed as regular consultant. Worked as a bureau director in the medical board from 1938 to 1941 and has been the county veterinarian in Gotland since 1941. Vice chairman of the Swedish Junior Veterinary Association in 1934 and board member of the Swedish Veterinary Association for the fight against bovine tuberculosis since 1938. Has been chairman of the Gotland Veterinary Association since 1941 and a member of the 1946 meat inspection committee. Secretary of the Gotland Animal Protection Association since 1942. Publications include "Current problems regarding the fight against bovine tuberculosis" (Lantbrukets Veckan's Handels, 1940) and "Tuberculosis control in cattle" (Hushållningssällskapet Tidskrift, 1940). Hobbies include motors and horseback riding.
